description: Ms. codex. Spine title. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on the fifth leaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 22 lines per page; written in small nastaʻliq in black on machine-made paper. Hand and paper change on leaf 96a. Rubrication; catchwords in second half of manuscript. Marginal notes. Mild staining. First four and last four leaves blank. Origin: Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1245 H [April-May 1830], by Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad (leaf 211b). Incipit: الحمد لله الذي اوضح مناهج الدين ... قوله قلت انکار التبادر اقول معنى کون التبادر
author: Riḍawī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Bāqir
abstract: Commentary on ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad al-Tūnī's al-Wāfiyah.
extent: 220 leaves : paper ; 206 x 118 (135-142 x 64-68) mm bound to 206 x 125 mm
creator: Riḍawī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Bāqir
رضوي، محمد بن محمد باقر،
subject: Tūnī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad, -1660 or 1661—Wāfiyah
binding_note: Limp maroon leather with blind-stamped fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
